title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power pack for your vehicle! With a massive 4000A peak current and a whopping 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is a powerhouse that can handle all gas engines and diesel engines up to 10L. 

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, LED light with multiple modes, and USB Quick Charge 3.0, this jump starter is not only powerful but also packed with features. Its intelligent protection systems ensure safety at all times, while the portable design makes it convenient to carry anywhere.

With the ability to start your vehicle up to 40 times on a single charge and charging ports for all your devices, this jump starter is a must-have for cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. Plus, with 24-hour online after-sales support, you can rest assured that you're in good hands. Don't wait for a dead battery to leave you stranded - get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for any emergency on the road! With a powerful 4000A peak current and a massive 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is capable of reviving all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines with ease. Say goodbye to dead batteries and hello to reliable performance!

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, LED light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, and intelligent protection systems against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections, this jump starter is a must-have for every vehicle owner. The portable design and included accessories make it convenient to carry and use whenever needed.

Not just for cars, this jump starter is suitable for motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles, providing up to 40 start times on a full charge. The fast-charging ports and rugged design ensure that you can count on it in any situation. Don't wait for a breakdown to happen, be prepared with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter by your side. Order now and enjoy the peace of mind knowing you have a reliable backup plan on the road.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your emergency power needs on the road! With a whopping 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is capable of reviving all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines with ease.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, LED light for emergencies, and USB Quick Charge 3.0 capability, this power pack is a must-have for every vehicle. The intelligent protection systems ensure safety from short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection.

With multiple charging ports including USB and Type-C, you can charge your devices on the go. The rugged design and metal clamps make it durable and reliable in any situation. And with a charging speed 75% faster than ordinary power banks, you can get back on the road in no time.

Whether you're driving a car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is your go-to companion. With 40 start times on a full charge, this portable battery starter is a lifesaver in any emergency.

Don't wait for a breakdown to happen, be prepared with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. Get yours today and enjoy the peace of mind knowing you have a reliable power source wherever you go. Plus, with our 24-hour online after-sales support team, you'll always have the backup you need. Don't miss out on this essential tool for every driver!

Not only does it jump-start your vehicle, but it also doubles as a portable battery charger with USB Quick Charge 3.0 technology for fast and efficient charging. Plus, the intelligent protection systems guarantee safety with features like short circuit protection, low battery alert, high temperature protection, and reverse connection prevention.

The package includes essential accessories like jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, and a carry case for easy transportation.

Experience the convenience and reliability of the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today! And with our 24-hour online after-sales support team, you can rest assured that we've got your back every step of the way. Don't wait for a dead battery to ruin your day, get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter now and stay powered up on the go!
